$$R_f/\phi$$

Source: R/strain_analysis.R
Rphi.Rd

$$R_f/\phi$$

Usage

Rphi(Rs, Ri = 1, theta)

Arguments

Rs

numeric.

Ri

numeric. Initial or pre-deformation aspect ratio of an elliptical object

theta

numeric. Fluctuation angle of undeformed marker w.r.t. computed principal direction of strain (in degrees)

Value

list. phi: the final angle (in degrees) between long axis and principal strain direction, Rf: final axial ratio

Examples

#' data(ramsay)
Rphi(ramsay[, 'R'], theta = ramsay[, 'phi'])
#> $phi
